post.body: Very true. Wish I were still in bed. The furnace kicked it last night so no heat at work today. Space heaters only work so well!
We certainly do ;-)
that is really funny. I just had to explain to my boss why I was laughing....she laughed too! We understand!
We are thinking no school tomorrow ourselves. Get as much done today as possible. Funny how the Mom's mind works!!
happy morning to you too! What's on today's agenda??
Had fun chatting with you today too. Where should we go for lunch tomorrow?
sweet!
Woo hooo Congratulations on your highest listenership month ever!
that sounds really yummy!
everything is still in reruns or reality - blah. Typically would watch Big Bang, HIMYM, 2 1/2 M, Chuck and CSI Miami
Yep, yep those are good too!
I know, I do the same thing, but better to have the conversation w/ the dr then have it get worse (always calm B4 the storm thing.
did you make a DR appt?
Great and glad to be back at work for a fully week - funny I missed it this much. Having a lot of fun catching up...and you?
I want a pic of that!!!!
Oh - I'm on day 4 of eating something for breakfast. I think this may be a new 10 year record, lol. I'm soooo not a breakfast eater!
Good morning all. Its Sunny & a crisp 23 degrees this morning. Supposed 2 have snow/sleet/rain move in 2morrow AM - I think I'll enjoy 2day.
Of to watch some tv and knit more of my scarf. Can't wait to learn how to increase and decrease.
There got a good chunk of work done on the blog I'm starting w/ a gal pal. Feels good 2 get most of it done. Almost ready 2 start posting.
I just love Russian accents ;-)
